Kindly note that the following location was affected due to the recent rains.

 

CITYWALK - L'Occitane Retail / Café - Unit no. B03-0-07A + Storage

 

L’Occitane Café is a café that operates in CITYWALK. There is around AED 30,000 worth of foodstuff that was thrown away because of electricity shutdown.

 

Also, there will be business interruption.

 

Please open a claim file and kindly assign a surveyor for this claim as this is a slightly complicated claim.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Hani,


Hope all is well.

 

Kindly note that the following location was affected due to the recent rains.

 

CITYWALK - L'Occitane Retail / Café - Unit no. B03-0-07A + Storage

 

L’Occitane Café is a café that operates in CITYWALK. There is around AED 30,000 worth of foodstuff that was thrown away because of electricity shutdown.

 

Also, there will be business interruption.

 

Please open a claim file and kindly assign a surveyor for this claim as this is a slightly complicated claim.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

Dear Hani,


Hope all is well.

 

Kindly note that the following location was affected due to the recent rains.

 

CITYWALK - L'Occitane Retail / Café - Unit no. B03-0-07A + Storage

Also, there will be business interruption.

Hope all is well.

CITYWALK - L'Occitane Retail / Café - Unit no. B03-0-07A + Storage

Hope all is well.

 

Kindly note that the following location was affected due to the recent rains.

 

CITYWALK - L'Occitane Retail / Café - Unit no. B03-0-07A + Storage

Also, there will be business interruption.

--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hani,

 

Please find below the full claim file.

 

Incident Overview

*	Date & Location:

	*	Incident Date: April 15, 2024
	*	Location: L’Occitane Café, Citywalk, Dubai

*	Cause:

	*	Heavy rainfall resulted in significant water damage.
	*	The heavy downpour led to an electricity shutdown, further exacerbating the damage.

*	Impacts:

	*	Material Property Damage: Damage to food stock and equipment (e.g., spoiled food items, damaged equipment).
	*	Business Interruption (BI) Losses: Reduction in Gross Profit (for affected period)

 

BI Calculation Methodology

*	Historical turnover data for the years 2023 and 2024 was analysed.
*	Average daily sales based on day of the week was analysed as the variation is material (weekday vs weekend)
*	Catering turnover was excluded when calculating the average BI to remove unnecessary noise. (Catering demand fluctuates heavily)

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Hani Gebara <Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com>
CC: Yogesh Naresh Patil <Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-13 09:22
Subject: RE: Insured: Allied Enterprises LLC (Chalhoub) / L'Occitane Cafe - Citywalk - Water Damage - DOL: 15/04/2024 - Nasco Ref: 66-FIR-2024-04-000147
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hani,

 

Please find below the full claim file.

 

Incident Overview

*	Date & Location:

	*	Incident Date: April 15, 2024
	*	Location: L’Occitane Café, Citywalk, Dubai

*	Cause:

	*	Heavy rainfall resulted in significant water damage.
	*	The heavy downpour led to an electricity shutdown, further exacerbating the damage.

*	Impacts:

	*	Material Property Damage: Damage to food stock and equipment (e.g., spoiled food items, damaged equipment).
	*	Business Interruption (BI) Losses: Reduction in Gross Profit (for affected period)

 

BI Calculation Methodology

*	Historical turnover data for the years 2023 and 2024 was analysed.
*	Average daily sales based on day of the week was analysed as the variation is material (weekday vs weekend)
*	Catering turnover was excluded when calculating the average BI to remove unnecessary noise. (Catering demand fluctuates heavily)

Dear Hani,


Hope all is well.

 

Kindly note that the following location was affected due to the recent rains.

 

CITYWALK - L'Occitane Retail / Café - Unit no. B03-0-07A + Storage

Also, there will be business interruption.

Hagop

*	Incident Date: April 15, 2024
	*	Location: L’Occitane Café, Citywalk, Dubai

*	Cause:

	*	Heavy rainfall resulted in significant water damage.
	*	The heavy downpour led to an electricity shutdown, further exacerbating the damage.

*	Impacts:

	*	Material Property Damage: Damage to food stock and equipment (e.g., spoiled food items, damaged equipment).
	*	Business Interruption (BI) Losses: Reduction in Gross Profit (for affected period)

 

BI Calculation Methodology

*	Historical turnover data for the years 2023 and 2024 was analysed.
*	Average daily sales based on day of the week was analysed as the variation is material (weekday vs weekend)
*	Catering turnover was excluded when calculating the average BI to remove unnecessary noise. (Catering demand fluctuates heavily)

*	Incident Date: April 15, 2024
	*	Location: L’Occitane Café, Citywalk, Dubai

*	Cause:

	*	Heavy rainfall resulted in significant water damage.
	*	The heavy downpour led to an electricity shutdown, further exacerbating the damage.

*	Impacts:

	*	Material Property Damage: Damage to food stock and equipment (e.g., spoiled food items, damaged equipment).
	*	Business Interruption (BI) Losses: Reduction in Gross Profit (for affected period)

 

BI Calculation Methodology

*	Historical turnover data for the years 2023 and 2024 was analysed.
*	Average daily sales based on day of the week was analysed as the variation is material (weekday vs weekend)
*	Catering turnover was excluded when calculating the average BI to remove unnecessary noise. (Catering demand fluctuates heavily)

Notes:

 

*	April 2023 is not a representative month as March 22 to April 20, 2023 was Ramadan which naturally reduces the demand for the café.
